name: E.R.O.D.O
description:
Game Designer : Enes Bilgin

Game Developer : Ömer Yüzügülen

This is a very simple game which have designer in Unity. It is a simple click and play web base word puzzle game.

It is very easy to play, all you have to is guess the related icons from their appearance's and find the connections in  between words.

The game has some features like buying jokers down below thebgame screen and it also shows you the root of the words when you complete the each level itself.

Enjoy.
